scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const {execSync}=require('child_process');if(fs.existsSync('client/package.json')){execSync('npm --prefix client run build',{stdio:'inherit'});}else{console.log('Skipping client build: client/package.json not found.');}"
